summary: Build an NGO-related website for “डिजिटल भारत एकता संगठन” with provided Hindi welcome message, mission statement, goals, and values.
known_issues: Production deployment domain validation error when using Hindi/Devanagari characters in domain name (must be 5–50 chars, only letters/numbers/hyphens).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive NGO website (single-page or simple multi-section layout) for “Digital Bharat Ekta Sangathan (डिजिटल भारत एकता संगठन)” with clear navigation to key sections: Welcome, Mission/What We Do, Goal, Values, and Contact.

Display the user-provided Hindi content verbatim in the Welcome/Mission area, including the quote, description of support beyond money, the goal “1,00,000 ईमानदार साथी”, and the values “एकता • पारदर्शिता • मानवता • न्याय”, plus the closing line “एकता से सशक्त भारत”.

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for an NGO (avoid blue/purple as the primary palette): define consistent typography, spacing, section backgrounds, and a calm, trustworthy color system across the entire site.

Add a Contact section with a simple contact form UI (name, email/phone, message) and clear disclaimer that submissions are not yet delivered (no backend integration), plus visible organization name in the footer.
Add generated static images to enhance the site’s presentation and render them from frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image serving).
Add a new dedicated page section titled “₹1 सहयोग कैसे काम करता है?” and display the user-provided Hindi explanation text verbatim, preserving line breaks.

Add the new “₹1 सहयोग कैसे काम करता है?” section to the single-page flow and navigation: render it in the main page (App) and add a corresponding header navigation item that smooth-scrolls to the new section.

Store the new section’s title and body copy in the existing Hindi content source (frontend/src/content/hi.ts) as new fields, and have the new section component read from those fields (no hardcoded copy in the component).
Add a new single-page section for member registration, reachable via a header navigation item, using an on-page registration form (frontend-only UI).
Implement the member registration form UI with client-side validation and a clear disclaimer that submissions are not delivered/saved yet (no backend integration).
Update the organization name in frontend/src/content/hi.ts from 'डिजिटल भारत एकता संगठन' to 'जन कल्याण संगठन'
Update any English transliteration or romanized references to reflect 'Jan Kalyan Sangathan' instead of 'Digital Bharat Ekta Sangathan'
Update the organization name in frontend/src/content/hi.ts from 'जन कल्याण संगठन' to 'जन कल्याण एकता संगठन'
Update the English transliteration in frontend/index.html title from 'Jan Kalyan Sangathan' to 'Jan Kalyan Ekta Sangathan'
Update any romanized references in comments or documentation from 'Jan Kalyan Sangathan' to 'Jan Kalyan Ekta Sangathan' to maintain consistency

new_feature_requests.summary: Create NGO website for “डिजिटल भारत एकता संगठन” featuring Hindi welcome/mission content, goals (1,00,000 ईमानदार साथी), and values (एकता, पारदर्शिता, मानवता, न्याय).

Add a dedicated “₹1 सहयोग कैसे काम करता है?” section and display the user-provided Hindi explanation text verbatim (1,00,000 people × ₹1 = ₹1,00,000; used for one needy person’s financial/administrative help within legal limits; not charity—mutual support).

Add a Help/Complaint submission section (form fields: Name, Mobile Number, District/State, Issue Type, Short Description, Evidence if any) and display the disclaimer: “बिना सत्य जानकारी के किसी भी मामले पर कार्रवाई नहीं होगी।”
Add a ‘विचारधारा’/Ideology section highlighting the lines: “संगठन आवाज़ है, अदालत नहीं” and “संगठन मार्गदर्शन है, टकराव नहीं”.
Add a member registration option (member signup/registration UI).
Update organization name to 'जन कल्याण एकता संगठन' in Hindi content
